availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Michael Houze (Switzerland County, Indiana, farmer and private 83rd IN Vol Inf)

body.p: Switzerland County, Indiana, farmer. Indiana native. Married to Catharine Fay Houze in Switzerland County on March 10, 1839. Father of Margaret Houze and John W. Houze. Married to Elizabeth Jane Wainscott Roberts Houze in Switzerland County on May 19, 1844. Father of John F. Houze, Albert J. Houze, Mary Elizabeth Houze, Jordan Rudolph Houze, and Viola Estelle Houze. Farmer in Switzerland County in 1850. Farmer in Switzerland County in 1860. Farmer in Switzerland County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
